data.title: VA - Slađana Milošević, Ilan Kabiljo, Igor Savin & Laza Ristovski Edits #III
data.meta_description:
VA - Slađana Milošević, Ilan Kabiljo, Igor Savin & Laza Ristovski Edits #III by Borgie, released 05 August 2022

1. Slađana Milošević - Neko Je Tu (Sa Mnom U Sobi) (Borgie Extended Drive Edit)
2. Ilan Kabiljo - Kad Nema Ljubavi (Borgie Slow Extended Edit)
3. Igor Savin - Alfa (Borgie Delta Funk Extended Edit)
4. Laza Ristovski - Figueras (Borgie Arp Extended Edit)

Third chapter of the unforgetable songs from past decades in extended edits, for your listening pleasure!

Neko Je Tu (Sa Mnom U Sobi)
Arranged By – Slađana Milošević
Lyrics By – Momčilo Bajagić
Music By – Bruce Werber
Jugoton – LSY-63185
1983

Kad Nema Ljubavi
Backing Vocals – Franciska Gluhak
Producer, Keyboards, Percussion, Programmed By, Guitar – Zvonimir Dusper, Ilan Kabiljo
ZG ZOE Music – MC 032
1996

Alfa
Arranged, Written-By – Igor Savin
Producer – Vanja Lisak
Bass Guitar – Mladen Baraković
Drums – Petar Petej-Peco
Trombone I – Radmilo Maslovarić
Trombone II – Herbert Stenzel
Trumpet I – Stanko Selak
Trumpet II – Marijan Domić
Trumpet III – Stanko Brihta*
Flute, Flute Bass, Saxophone Tenor – Miroslav Sedak - Benčić
Jugoton – LSY-61437
1979

Figueras
Composed By, Arranged By, Synthesizer, Mellotron – Laza Ristovski
Producer, Engineer – Saša Habić, Đorđe Petrović
Executive Producer – Veselin Maldaner
PGP RTB – 2121794
1984

///PROMO USE ONLY!
data.text:
DJ, Producer & founder of the labels Adriatiko Recordings/ Psihometron/ Sampler Made.

For the 20+ years been promoting dozens of club events across the region. Furthermore collaborated and contributed actively to the selected European electronic music clubs/ festivals and to local independent collectives. ... more
